name: AI Evaluation
instruction: Call `screen_candidate` tool using the IDs from Step 1. Focus on Tech and Culture scores. You MUST call this tool to get findings.

name: Synthesis
instruction: Analyze the worker reports and generate a final comparative analysis.

name: Completion
instruction: Generate a professional dummy email message (Invitation/Rejection) for the candidate based on the approval.

name: Recursive Spawning
instruction: For each identified candidate/file, call [spawn_worker(file_path, question)](cci:1://file:///Users/m.mohamednadheem/Documents/zoworks/agentscope-ai-antigravity/RLM/rlm_runner.py:38:0-74:83). Each worker must return a 3-sentence summary.

name: Human Review
instruction: Summarize technical and culture scores. You MUST call the request_action_approval tool with action_type="approve_candidate" to log this step. Do NOT proceed until you have called this tool and been granted approval.

name: Exploration
instruction: Call [list_files](cci:1://file:///Users/m.mohamednadheem/Documents/zoworks/agentscope-ai-antigravity/RLM/rlm_runner.py:24:0-36:83) to catalog the data folder. Identify which transcripts match the user query.

name: Data Entry
instruction: 1. Call search_requisitions for the job name. 2. Search for the candidate by name using search_candidates; if not found, call ingest_resumes(resume_url) or create_candidates. 3. Call create_applications(candidate_id, requisition_id). Finish all 3 before proceeding.
